snippet.title: Chart shows how crazy Neymar's transfer fee was to go from Barcelona to PSG
snippet.content:
After whirlwind couple of weeks, Neymar was formally introduced as the newest member of French soccer giant Paris Saint-Germain after paying a world-record transfer fee of US$263 million (€222 million).
On top of that, Neymar's new five-year contract will come with an annual salary of $US53 million (€45 million), making him the highest-paid footballer in the world. In total, .
While we can debate whether or not Neymar deserves to be the highest-paid player in the world, it is the transfer fee that is the most jaw-dropping. To get a better sense of just how big it was, here is how it compares to the largest reported transfer fees, . It is Neymar and nobody else is even close.
